name: Headless Happenings
description:
H͢e͢a͢d͢l͢e͢s͢s H͢a͢p͢p͢e͢n͢i͢n͢g͢s

Platform-Puzzler based off of the Legend of the Headless Horseman!

Genres: Puzzle-Platformer, Retro, MetroidVania [implemented in future updates]

Use your head to pass puzzles and hazards while exploring a retro look at Sleepy Hollow!

Very short tech-demo, will be expanded and polished into a full game over time :>

Stick around for future updates!

Thank you very much for playing!
